HPGCC Window System

1.0

The HPGCC window system will provides a small collection of common graphical user interface building blocks, from which interactive applications can be built in HPGCC.

The main features of the window system include:

  • A general-purpose event queue to deliver both standard and custom events to all interested parties.
  • A simple widget model allowing developers to write re-usable graphical widgets.
  • An implementation of the standard HP calculator keyboard operation, including correct operation of shift and alpha keys.
  • A soft menu widget to associate operations with function keys.
